#summary List of the different types of help we need.

= Introduction =

Tweaking the source code of MicroLua is not the only way to help the community. Here are some hints.

= Documentation =

Writing docs and tutorials is a great way to help improve MicroLua. If not already done, request the EditWiki permission and create or improve some wiki pages.

= Translation =

You'll need to know HowToUseSvn or HowToUseGit, because [http://code.google.com/p/support/issues/detail?id=2468 localized pages cannot be edited via the web interface at the moment].

= Tests =

Reporting [http://code.google.com/p/microlua/issues/list issues] is a way to help improve MicroLua.
